title: New: The Pale White – Downer
content:
Photo: Daniel Stark

Despite having now made the move to London, there will always be a special place in my heart for Newcastle.

With a thriving music scene unlike any there for the past decade or so, and raucous trio The Pale White leading the charge, it’s a truly exciting time for the north east. Their latest single, Downer, is an ode to the infamous drinking culture found in Newcastle, specifically nights spent in Gotham, the most gloriously unique of bars. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
